name: Venusaurite
description:
Upstairs in northern gate on Route 16, from 
Scientist upon showing Venusaur.

name: Charizardite X
description:
(Swapped with Charizardite Y in Hardcore)
Upstairs in northern gate on Route 16, from 
Scientist after showing Charizard.

name: Sceptilite
description: From Brendan after defeating him on Route 23.

name: Blastoisinite
description:
Upstairs in northern gate on Route 16, from 
Scientist upon showing Blastoise.

name: Blazikenite
description:
From May after defeating her on Cinnabar Island, 
in front of the Pokémon Mansion.

name: Swampertite
description:
From the Dumbass Mudkip Kid in Saffron City, 
after defeating him, then talking to him with a 
Swampert follower.

name: Lucarionite
description:
In Celadon City, from the guy close to the 
Pokémon Center having a Lucario if you have a 
Lucario follower. (Soul Badge needed)

name: Alakazite
description:
Celadon City's Department Store, from a little
girl on the rooftop.

name: Sablenite
description:
Lavender Town's Pokémon Tower in the 3rd floor, 
north side of the room.

name: Kangaskhanite
description:
Saffron City's Silph Co. 7th floor, in the bottom 
left part of the floor, near a Scientist.

name: Audinite
description:
Saffron City's Silph Co. 6th floor, at the south 
west part of the floor, near a Scientist.

name: Garbodorite
description:
Saffron City's Silph Co. 4th floor, in the far 
western room, Keycard is required to enter.

name: Absolite
description:
Route 17, on the south side near a sign post 
between two ponds.

name: Gardevoirite
description:
(Swapped with Cameruptite in Hardcore) From 
Sabrina after defeating her and showing a Pokémon 
with 31 IVs in all stats. (or a shiny in MGM/Hardcore)

name: Kinglerite
description: Route 21, on an islet.

name: Altarianite
description: Route 18, near the grass.

name: Drednawite
description:
Route 19, on a small islet on the south side of the 
Route. (Surf HM required)

name: Sharpedonite
description:
Route 12, from the Fisherman in a house if you 
talk to him with a Sharpedo follower.

name: Heracronite
description: Safari Zone Eastern Area.

name: Toxtricitite
description:
From Koga after defeating him and showing him 
a Pokémon with at least 150 EVs in Spe.
(or 125 Base Spe in MGM/Hardcore)

name: Pidgeotite
description: Safari Zone North Area, up north.

name: Lopunnite
description: Safari Zone Western Area, at the south.

name: Glalitite
description: Route 20, from Pryce after defeating him.

name: Beedrillite
description:
Safari Zone North Area, in the eastern part of 
the area.

name: Laprasite
description:
Seafoam Islands B2F, north eastern part of the 
floor.

name: Abomasite
description: Seafoam Islands B2F, southern part of the floor.

name: Medichamite
description:
Route 20 (Cinnabar Island side), on a small islet 
below a stationary female Swimmer.

name: Aggronite
description:
In the Pokémon Lab, from Jasmine after defeating 
her.

name: Latiasite
description:
In Pokémon Lab's rightmost room, from Scientist 
at left table when showing Latias or Latios.

name: Latiosite
description:
In Pokémon Lab's rightmost room, from Scientist 
at left table when showing Latios or Latias.

name: Cameruptite
description:
(Swapped with Gardevoirite in Hardcore)
Cinnabar Island's Pokémon Mansion 1F, accessed 
by falling through the hole on 3F.

name: Steelixite
description:
From Jasmine after defeating her and showing her 
a Pokémon with 150 EVs in Def.
(125 Base Def in MGM/Hardcore)

name: Tyranitarite
description: Route 24, on a small islet.

name: Charizardite Y
description:
(Swapped with Charizardite X in Hardcore) From 
Blaine after defeating him and showing a Pokémon 
with 150 EVs in SpA. (125 Base SpA in MGM/Hardcore)

name: Houndoominite
description:
Cerulean Cave 1F, from Archer after defeating 
him in battle.

name: Mawilite
description:
Cerulean Cave 1F, from Ariana after defeating 
her in battle.

name: Pinsirite
description: Route 6, south west of the pond.

name: Mewtwonite Y
description:
From Giovanni after defeating him in Cerulean 
Cave.

name: Machampite
description:
Power Plant, from Dumbass Jojo Fan after 
defeating him.

name: Ampharosite
description: Power Plant, in the north east corner.

name: Slowbronite
description:
Route 12, on an islet just south of the sleeping 
Snorlax.

name: Coalossite
description: Rock Tunnel 1F. (Rock Smash HM needed)

name: Butterfrite
description: Viridian Forest. (Rock Smash HM required)

name: Salamencite
description:
From Lance after defeating Giovanni in Cerulean 
Cave.

name: Scizorite
description:
Route 22, below the pond and a ledge in the 
center. (Surf HM required)

name: Orbeetlite
description:
Route 2, above Diglett's Cave. (Rock Smash HM 
required)

name: Garchompite
description:
Cerulean Cave B1F, in the north east area of the 
floor.

name: Snorlaxite
description:
Route 23, to the north of the Route, above the 
Volcano badge check gate.

name: Aerodactylite
description:
Pewter City, from Brock after defeating him in a 
rematch.

name: Metagrossite
description:
Victory Road 2F, near a Juggler at the northeast 
part of the floor.

name: Gyaradosite
description:
Cerulean City, from Misty after defeating her 
in a rematch.

name: Manectite
description:
Vermilion City, from Lt. Surge after defeating 
him in a rematch.

name: Gengarite
description:
Lavender Town in Fuji's House, from Morty after 
getting the Mega Ring if you show him a 
Pokémon with max happiness.

name: Galladite
description:
From Chuck after defeating him, and showing 
him a Pokémon with at least 150 EVs in Atk.
(125 Base Atk in MGM/Hardcore)

name: Centiskite
description:
Route 8, from Ace Trainer Cole after defeating 
him, only after getting the Mega Ring.

name: Copperajite
description:
On islet below Vermilion City Gym. 
(Surf HM required)

name: Sandacondite
description:
Route 15, from Ace Trainer Haley after defeating 
her.

name: Applite
description:
Celadon City's Hotel, after getting the Mega Ring 
and defeating the two Beauties in there.

name: Banettite
description:
Cinnabar Island's Pokémon Mansion B1F, south 
western part of the floor.

name: Alcremite
description:
From a woman in a Saffron City house, after bring 
to her the ingredients for a cake. (x1 Rawst Berry, 
x1 Aspear Berry, x2 Moomoo Milk)

name: Mewtwonite X
description:
(POST-GAME) One Island, Treasure Beach, from 
Red after defeating him on the beach.
(Requires 4+ win streak in the Battle Simulator)

name: Diancite
description:
Cerulean Cave 2F, in the north east area of the 
floor, accessed by going up the north east ladder 
on 1F.
